00046   class Key {
00047   public:
00048 
00049     static const uint8_t HAVE_REVISION  = 0x80;
00050     static const uint8_t HAVE_TIMESTAMP = 0x40;
00051     static const uint8_t AUTO_TIMESTAMP = 0x20;
00052     static const uint8_t REV_IS_TS      = 0x10;
00053 
00054     static const char *END_ROW_MARKER;
00055     static const char *END_ROOT_ROW;
00056 
00057     static inline void encode_ts64(uint8_t **bufp, int64_t val) {
00058       val = ~val;
00059 #ifdef HT_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00060       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 56);
00061       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 48);
00062       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 40);
00063       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 32);
00064       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 24);
00065       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 16);
00066       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)(val >> 8);
00067       *(*bufp)++ = (uint8_t)val;
00068 #else
00069       memcpy(*bufp, &val, 8);
00070       *bufp += 8;
00071 #endif
00072     }
00073 
00074     static inline int64_t decode_ts64(const uint8_t **bufp) {
00075       int64_t val;
00076 #ifdef HT_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00077       val = ((int64_t)*(*bufp)++ << 56);
00078       val |= ((int64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 48);
00079       val |= ((int64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 40);
00080       val |= ((int64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 32);
00081       val |= ((int64_t)(*(*bufp)++) << 24);
00082       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 16);
00083       val |= (*(*bufp)++ << 8);
00084       val |= *(*bufp)++;
00085 #else
00086       memcpy(&val, *bufp, 8);
00087       *bufp += 8;
00088 #endif
00089       return ~val;
00090     }
00091 
00095     Key() : row(0), column_qualifier(0), row_len(0), column_qualifier_len(0),
00096             timestamp(0), revision(AUTO_ASSIGN), column_family_code(0),
00097             flag(FLAG_INSERT) { }
00098 
00105     Key(SerializedKey key);
00106 
00113     bool load(SerializedKey key);
00114 
00115     size_t len_row() const { return row_len; }
00116 
00117     size_t len_column_family() const {
00118       return(column_qualifier - row);
00119     }
00120 
00121     size_t len_cell() const {
00122       return (column_qualifier - row) + column_qualifier_len;
00123     }
00124 
00125     SerializedKey  serial;
00126     uint32_t       length;
00127 
00128     const char    *row;
00129     const char    *column_qualifier;
00130     uint32_t       row_len;                     // excluding null byte
00131     uint32_t       column_qualifier_len;        // ditto
00132     const uint8_t *flag_ptr;
00133     int64_t        timestamp;
00134     int64_t        revision;
00135     uint8_t        column_family_code;
00136     uint8_t        flag;
00137     uint8_t        control;
00138   };

00154   operator<<(std::ostream &os, const SerializedKey &serkey) {
00155     Key key(serkey);
